SELECT NVL(MAX(id)+1,1) as id FROM sj_company
INSERT INTO sj_company(id,addr,tel,name,img,text,menu,category,map) VALUES(#{id},#{addr},#{tel},#{name},#{img},#{text},#{menu},#{category},#{map})
mapper.select: SELECT id,addr,tel,name,img,text,menu,category,map,num FROM (SELECT id,addr,tel,name,img,text,menu,category,map,rownum as num FROM (SELECT id,addr,tel,name,img,text,menu,category,map FROM sj_company WHERE category='맛집' AND map=#{map} ORDER BY id)) WHERE (num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end})
